title: Large and Quiet Room for Rent in Markham, Ontario
description:
DescriptionLarge Room for Rent in a 4 -bedroom house 2nd Fl. Located in Markham road and Denison street. Minutes to Highways, Transit and local buses, nearby Shopping stores, Parks, Centennial College (Progress Campus), UofT (Scarborough), Restaurants, Golf Club, very close to Costco, Home Depot, Canadian Tire, Walmart, Low’s, NoFrills, All major Banks, and many more amenities.
- Shared kitchen with breakfast area, Shared Bathroom, second floor laundry (shared)
- All utilities included in the price
- Free Cable TV and Internet
- Non-Smoking, No pets
- Ideal for working professionals/students
- Rent For $850 per month for one person only
- Availability: April 15, 2023
- No parking available with the room
Required:
Rental Application
Job letters, two recent pay stubs (for working professionals)
Credit bureau reports and Credit Score
Two Government’s photo ID
Tenant insurance (Optional)
For more information, please call 416-953-1374 or reply to ads. Serious inquiries only. Thank you.
